title: Equation for minimum distance between particles

content.prompt: Which of the following equations could be used to find rMIN, the minimum distance between the masses as particle A approaches particle B?

choices.label: β 4 D 2 + M v 0 2 = β r MIN 2 + M ( v 0 2 ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbiqaaqdcdaWcaa qaceaa0GGaeqOSdigabaGaaGinaiaadseadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikda aaaaaOGaey4kaSIaamytaiaadAhadaqhaaWcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaik daaaGccqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiabek7aIbqaaiaadkhadaqhaaWcbaGa ciyBaiaacMgacaGGUbaabaGaaGOmaaaaaaGccqGHRaWkcaWGnbWaae WaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaadAhadaWgaaWcbaGaaGimaaqabaaakeaacaaI YaaaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaaa@4D4B@
